column3: but not one that's worth a lengthy wait.  I liked they had a lot of fun stuff on the menu
column5: but a few things were off.  The fun-looking hash brown "disks" could have been a lot more crispy.  My eggs came out over easy
column6: not over medium as ordered.  A side of pulled pork came swimming in cooking juices
column7: and while hot sauce was available
column8: I was told there was no bbq sauce.  Iced coffee was good
column10: unlike hot coffee which is bottomless.  Service was really good
column12: I was expecting something a bit better-executed than what we got.
